Suite.SuiteDescription: Terms that every application should support

OtherParam.OtherParamDescription: specifies whether or not changes should be saved before closing
the file in which to save the object

Event.EventDescription: Return the number of elements of a particular class within an object
Event.DirectParmDescription: the object whose elements are to be counted

OtherParam.OtherParamDescription: the class of the elements to be counted

Event.EventDescription: Return the size in bytes of an object
Event.ReplyDirectParamDescription: the size of the object in bytes
Event.DirectParmDescription: the object whose data size is to be returned

Event.ReplyDirectParamDescription: true if it exists, false if not

Event.EventDescription: Get the data for an object
Event.DirectParmDescription: the object whose data is to be returned

Event.ReplyDirectParamDescription: Object specifier for the new element

OtherParam.OtherParamDescription: the class of the new element
the location at which to insert the element
the initial data for the element
the initial values for the properties of the element

Event.DirectParmDescription: Objects to open. Can be a list of files or an object specifier.
Objects to print. Can be a list of files or an object specifier.

OtherParam.OtherParamDescription: the file in which to save the object(s)
the file type of the document in which to save the data

ClassProperty.PropertyDescription: Various preferences that apply to the application as a whole
Has the document been modified since the last save?
the document that owns this window
the boundary rectangle for the window
Does the window have a close box?
Does the window have a title bar?

Enumerator.EnumeratorDescription: Ask the user whether to save

Suite.SuiteDescription: Useful events that aren't in any other suite

Event.EventDescription: Revert an object to the most recently saved version

Suite.SuiteDescription: Things that should be in some standard suite, but aren't

Event.EventDescription: Makes an object the 'focus' of AppleEvents

OtherParam.OtherParamDescription: reference to new focus of AppleEvents
